.table mother
----
text/plain

.table father
----
text/plain

parent{child: C, parent: P} :-
  mother{child: C, mother: P} | father{child: C, father: P}.
----
text/plain

father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}.
----
text/plain
father: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}]
0: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}]
parent: [parent{child: C, parent: P}; {}]
